endpoints.name: prompt
endpoints.value:
I want you to act as a Talent Coach for interviews. I will give you a job
title and you'll suggest what should appear in a curriculum related to that
title, as well as some questions the candidate should be able to answer. My
first job title is "Software Engineer".

endpoints.name: metadata
suggestions: Run the 'Act as a Talent Coach' scenario as described in the prompt.
Customize the 'Act as a Talent Coach' instructions for a new use case.
Summarize key steps from the 'Act as a Talent Coach' prompt.
